alert.note: Alert for Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 5:09AM PST until January 09 at 10:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Southeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Central Douglas County, Eastern Curry County and Josephine County and Eastern Douglas County Foothills, especially elevations above 1500 feet. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Weak trees and tree branches could come down. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Central Douglas County; Eastern Curry County and Josephine County; Eastern Douglas County Foothills
